DOC.brief_title: A Randomised Controlled Trial Family Mediated Exercises ( FAME ) Following Stroke
DOC.detailed_description: Participants primary stroke eligible inclusion study 2 week post stroke randomise either 'control ' group receive routine therapy 'experimental ' group receive routine therapy AND additional 'family mediate exercise therapy . Training provide nominated family member ( ) /friends participant 'intervention ' group weekly basis research physiotherapist ( R1 ) . Family members/friends requested keep exercise diary daily basis document completion exercise . The trial continue eight week expectation least 1200 additional minute FAME therapy deliver time period . Each FAME session expect last 35-40 minute . Exercises include repetitive sit stand exercise emphasis improve symmetry , weight bearing exercise stand , bridge , straight leg raise , quadriceps strengthen exercise , active/active assist range movement exercise low limb walking .
